title: Same/Difference
description: Metamorphosis.  An exquisite transformation. A necessary mechanism of evolution whereby the change is not only in appearance, but also behavior. My transformation possessed no beauty. Only pain.  But just as the caterpillar morphs to a butterfly my strength is refined in the struggle, my flaws cocooned in the dark. If I survive the alteration my reward is to drink nectar and float on the breeze. Where I was once vulnerable, I will rise above.  The same, but different.  My name is Paige.  I'm spreading my wings.
author: D.D. Lorenzo
